original_text: That is the reason why I am sending him to you. I want him to tell you what is happening to us here, so that you will feel stronger.
korean_text: 우리 사정을 알리고 또 너희 마음을 위로하기 위하여 내가 특별히 그를 너희에게 보내었노라

sentences.original_text: why I am sending him to you
I want him to tell you
what is happening to us here
sentences.korean_translation: 우리에게 여기서 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지

sentences.original_text: so that you will feel stronger
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 당신이 더 강함을 느끼게 될 것입니다
